00049 #ifndef GFAL_LONG64_FORMAT
00050 #if defined(__ia64__) || defined(__x86_64)
00051 #define GFAL_LONG64_FORMAT "%ld"
00052 #elif defined(_WIN32)
00053 #define GFAL_LONG64_FORMAT "%I64d"
00054 #else
00055 #define GFAL_LONG64_FORMAT "%lld"
00056 #endif
00057 #endif
00058 #ifndef GFAL_LONG64
00059 #if defined(__ia64__) || defined(__x86_64)
00060 #define GFAL_LONG64 long
00061 #elif defined(_WIN32)
00062 #define GFAL_LONG64 __i64
00063 #else
00064 #define GFAL_LONG64 long long
00065 #endif
00066 #endif

00068 /* Macro function to print debug info if LCG_GFAL_DEBUG is defined */

00070 #define GFAL_DEBUG(format, ...) \
00071         fprintf (stderr, format, ## __VA_ARGS__)
00072 #else
00073 #define GFAL_DEBUG(format, ...)
00074 #endif

00096 struct _gfal_srmv2_opt{
00097         int opt_srmv2_desiredpintime;                   //      optional desired default endpoint
00098         char** opt_srmv2_protocols;                             // optional protocols list for manual set
00099         char * opt_srmv2_spacetokendesc;                // optional spacetokens desc for srmv2   
00100         gint64 filesizes;
00101 };
00102 
00107 struct _gfal_request_state{
00108         char *                                          srmv2_token;
00109         struct srmv2_filestatus *       srmv2_statuses;
00110         struct srmv2_pinfilestatus *srmv2_pinstatuses;
00111         enum gfal_srm_proto current_request_proto;
00112         char *                                          request_endpoint; 
00113         gboolean                                        finished;                       // finished or not
00114         int                                                     number;                         // number of files in request
00115  };
00116  
00117 struct gfal_handle_ {
00118         enum gfal_srm_proto srm_proto_type;             // define the protocole version of SRM choosen by default
00119         gboolean initiated;                                     // 1 if initiated, else error
00120         // pointer to srmv2 set option
00121         gfal_srmv2_opt* srmv2_opt;
00122         // pointer to the last request resu
00123         gfal_request_state* last_request_state;
00124         // struct of the catalog opts
00125         struct _catalog_opts catalog_opt;
00126         //struct for the file descriptors
00127         gfal_descriptors_container fdescs;
00128         int no_bdii_check;
00129 };
